title: Victoria shooting update: alleged gunman fled with ‘powerful firearms’ and ‘understands bushcraft well’, police say
summary: Police have stated that suspect Dezi Freeman has extensive knowledge of the Victorian high country bushland. This announcement comes as tributes are paid to two police officers who lost their lives. The investigation continues as authorities search for Freeman in the area.

title: Australia police shooting: what we know so far about the search for ‘heavily armed’ suspect in Victoria
summary: Police are searching for a gunman who fatally shot two officers in Porepunkah, a regional town in Victoria, Australia. The incident has prompted an extensive manhunt, with authorities urging the public for any information. This tragic event has raised concerns about officer safety in the area.
